custom_field_indicators.Has_Component: Indicates if standard component field might have data (127 tickets total)
custom_field_indicators.Has_Company_Data: Indicates if cf[10413] might have company data
custom_field_indicators.Has_Urgency_Data: Indicates if cf[10450] might have urgency data (TRI-1858 = High)
custom_field_indicators.Has_Impact_Data: Indicates if cf[10451] might have impact data

derived_business_fields.Client_CID: Client ID extracted from summary (e.g., CID 1769)
derived_business_fields.Category_From_Summary: Business category based on summary analysis
derived_business_fields.Issue_Category: Type of request (New, Change, Issue, Removal)

pivot_suggestions: Status vs Category_From_Summary (workflow by business area)
Assignee vs Issue_Category (workload by request type)
